resources:
My Portfolio
Hi, my name is Arthur. I am a programmer for mobile applications in Android. I have started my career as a coding teacher for kids and teenagers in Brazil. Today i working as freelancer in Android Develpment, using Java and Kotlin to create, maintain and test applications. My goal is to acquire even more skills with Android and contribute to build better apps with focus on its impact over the customers.
Im looking forward to get a position as a developer in a company, in wich i could bring my experience as code teacher to develop, create, test and maybe come up with new ideas for the market.
